mapper.select: select * from POLY_CONTENTS order by cidx desc
select * from POLY_CONTENTS order by cViewCnt desc

select c.cidx, c.cSubject, c.cRuntime, c.cOpenYear, c.cStory,c.cImage,c.cPreVideo,r.rPoint, avg(r.rPoint) as star from POLY_CONTENTS c, POLY_REVIEW r where c.cidx = r.cidx group by c.cidx,c.cSubject,c.cRuntime,c.cOpenYear,c.cStory,c.cImage,c.cPreVideo,r.rPoint order by star desc

select c.cidx,c.cSubject,c.cRuntime,c.cOpenYear,c.cStory,c.cImage,c.cPreVideo,o.oid,p.pStatus, count(*) as cnt from POLY_CONTENTS c, POLY_ORDER o, POLY_PAY p where c.cidx = o.cidx and o.oid = p.oid and p.pStatus='Y' group by c.cidx,c.cSubject,c.cRuntime,c.cOpenYear,c.cStory,c.cImage,c.cPreVideo,o.oid,p.pStatus order by cnt
